amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to provide assistance to a State, or political subdivision of a State, that has in effect any law, policy, or procedure in contravention of immigration laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A084) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A084) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A084) offered by Mr. Collins (GA).
